data.title: İSKENDER PAYDAŞ
data.text:
İSKENDER PAYDAŞ AND ‘THE TIMELESS SONGS’ ORCHESTRA

İskender Paydaş has given 400 concerts in 3 years with his orchestra that he named Zamansız Şarkılar /Timeless Songs after he released his two albums under the same name. He offers a powerful stage performance and very good music – from dynamic to emotional tunes -with popular turkish songs and the famous worldwide hits as well…

He performed in many special events last year for; Borusan ( BMW) ; Doğuş Automotive ( AUDİ; PORCHE; VOLKSWAGEN ) , NIKE , SHELL, BOOMERANG; MİKA TOURİSM , WEDDİNGS İN FOUR SEASONS BOSPHORUS, WEDDİNGS İN SHANGRİ LA BOSPHORUS , TIMELESS MOMENTS NİGHTS in Frankie Club İstanbul, RİXOS PREMİUM HOTEL Bodrum, VOYAGE RESORT TORBA Bodrum, ÇIRAGAN KEMPİNSKİ HOTEL İstanbul , etc…

About İskender Paydaş

A musician with so many awards…producer, arranger, composer, music director, song writer, keyboard and piano player and drummer. He has been drawn into music since his childhood because of his father who is a very famous jazz musicien and who would do his drum rehearsals at their home. He began to take piano lessons and sing professionnaly at the age 5. He released two singles at this age and gave 145 concerts under the stage name “Alexander the great”. At the age of nine, He attended the İstanbul University State Conservatory’s piano department while he continues his education at the primary school.Those were the times which his compositions began to show.He has a unique and rich style blended with his classical education and the effect of his father’s modern style. He was created his own rock band at the age of 13 with a dream of giving a concert at the Taksim square. After his high school graduation at 1985 he began to do arrangements. And worked with almost every single popular singer in Turkey…

Since then; He performed as a music director and arranger for; Kayahan, Nilüfer, Nazan Öncel, Harun Kolçak, Aşkın Nur Yengi, Ajda Pekkan, Suat Suna, Kibariye, Orhan Gencebay, Sertap Erener, Ege, Asya, Mustafa Sandal, Levent Yüksel, Mazhar Fuat Özkan , Özgün, GECE, Atiye, Nil Karaibrahimgil, Keremcem, Sıla, Hadise, Deniz Seki and Murat Dalkılıç. He performed as a producer and music director for; Mirkelam, Şebnem Ferah, Emre Altuğ, Ajda Pekkan and Aşkın Nur Yengi. He also produced the original soundtrack of the movies; Istanbul for Aficionados, Hırsız Var, Türkler Çıldırmış Olmalı,Şaşkın, Pak Panter, Kolpaçino, Bu İşte Bir Yalnızlık Var and TV dramas as İmkansız Aşk, Ümit Milli, Ah Bir Polis Olsam, Lale Devri, Kurt Kanunu, En Uzun Yüzyıl, Ben Onu Çok Sevdim

He released two albums under the name Zamansız şarkılar / Timeless songs in 2011 and 2014 which consisted of his re-arranged songs. He has given 400 concerts with his orchestra under the same name and at the same time that the album released.
